methods.name: addCategory
javadoc: Creates a CrashReportCategory for the given stack trace depth

methods.name: forThrowable
javadoc: Creates a crash report for the exception

methods.name: getDetails
javadoc: Gets the various sections of the crash report into the given StringBuilder

methods.name: getErrorComment
javadoc: Gets a random witty comment for inclusion in this CrashReport

methods.name: getException
javadoc: Returns the Throwable object that is the cause for the crash and Crash Report.

methods.name: getExceptionMessage
javadoc: Gets the stack trace of the Throwable that caused this crash report, or if that fails, the cause .toString().

methods.name: getFriendlyReport
javadoc: Gets the complete report with headers, stack trace, and different sections as a string.

methods.name: getSaveFile
javadoc: Gets the file this crash report is saved into.

methods.name: getTitle
javadoc: Returns the description of the Crash Report.

methods.name: saveToFile
javadoc: Saves this CrashReport to the given file and returns a value indicating whether we were successful at doing so.
